QuestData.Title: Serpent's Scale
QuestData.Description: I see you have gained your own hatchling, $r.$B$BHave you been feeding it, cleaning after it, and playing with it properly? Only by doing so will it become strong and healthy.$B$BNow let me tell you a trainer's secret. To the north, in The Widow's Wail, you can find a mushroom known as Serpent's Scale.$B$BIt is difficult to acquire, but this mushroom has powerful properties and important nutrients. Your serpent won't like eating it, but who likes eating their vegetables?
